content.raw: Issue #351:  we should add the same plugin to all the other worlds.  In catkinized version, `VRCPlugin` will spawn the correct flavor of Atlas robot based on the roslaunch parameters.
content.html: Issue #351: we should add the same plugin to all the other worlds. In catkinized version, VRCPlugin will spawn the correct flavor of Atlas robot based on the roslaunch parameters.

content.raw:
The world plugin (VRCPlugin) is not loaded, so the robot starts up in simple joint position pid control mode. It would be hard to switch to BDI behavior control without the VRCPlugin.

Should we add the VRCPlugin we used during VRC to allow keyboard teleop walking?
content.html:
The world plugin (VRCPlugin) is not loaded, so the robot starts up in simple joint position pid control mode. It would be hard to switch to BDI behavior control without the VRCPlugin.

Should we add the VRCPlugin we used during VRC to allow keyboard teleop walking?
